Reviews.Title: “Scenic Hills - Nice little hotel”
Reviews.Author: Wandering57
Reviews.Content: stayed past 2 summers inside coridoors dont spend arm leg updated comfortable quiet clean staff friendly lots parking pool nice suggestion management upgrade keys electronic key cards chain locks doors

Reviews.Title: “Will definitely return”
Reviews.Author: StraitGirl
Reviews.Content: stayed memorial day weekend price cant beat scenic hills inn clean spacious beds comfortable believe refrigerator noticed bath towels soft unlike hotels towels sandpaper ac didnt cycle onoff usually awake doing liked blue route easy access tanger outlet mall branson landing attractions front desk staff friendly breakfast items limited cinnamon rolls encountered noisy people hotels fault highly recommend property clean reasonable rate plan returning

Reviews.Title: “Spring Break at Scenic Hills”
Reviews.Author: Monika B
Reviews.Content: stayed scenic hills inn recently family trip cant happy stay begin service front desk friendly help navigate hotel tourist attractions branson time customer service throughout stay welcoming helpful walked hotel pleased super clean comfortable plasma screen tv hard branson loved ate breakfast hotel kids loved cinnamon rolls liked able own food am pretty critical coffee hotels coffee fantastic finally pool hang night hot tub watch kids enjoy tub time thank staff scenic hills stay wont forget anytime soon

Reviews.Title: “Great for the Price”

Reviews.Content: taking quick drive drive branson inexpensive allow 2 dogs read reviews little motel found coupon 1st floor double queen plenty dogs fridge coffee pot coffee plus decent linens mattress mind remove dog urine spots matter dont freak spots carpet smell clean breakfast offered coffee milk couple cereal choices little bowls gravy plain raisin bagels biscuits toaster waffles french toast cinnamon rolls toast microwave else waiting crowded issue especially trying deal children offered decent selection especially 5000 plus decent pancake cheap runny

Reviews.Title: “Good Experience”
Reviews.Author: Justice1Independence
Reviews.Content: kenneth convention branson mo weekend stayed scenic hills inn motel clean owners nice selection breakfast 10 received jobs obligations prevented coming reserved owners enjoyable experience definitely stay soon

Reviews.Title: “Courteous staff/comfortable beds”
Reviews.Author: ARtraveler63
Reviews.Content: sixteen efficiently checked conveniently located property hotel arrangement little confusing lobby third floor elevators located lobby beds comfortable clean breakfast included usual offerings cinnamon rolls available days breakfast attendant welcoming helpful

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel--nice, clean and welcoming!”
Reviews.Author: guthriewoman
Reviews.Content: welcomed friendly helpful woman clean appeared linens nice flatscreen tv usual channels numerous information attractions discount coupons instructions severe weather included helpful breakfast hot plenty eat hotel easy easy access main road necessities expect refrigerator coffe pot coffee creamer suger hairdryer iron ironing board supplied soap shampooconditioner easy access ice vending machines availble floors plenty parking hot water wasnt hot plenty highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, Convenient, Clean & A Great Deal !!!!”
Reviews.Author: BransonVisitor11
Reviews.Content: staff friendly extremely helpful king leisure clean roomy quiet microwave refridgerator received deal entertainment rate 4 4 nights 5 days location easy access overall wonderful experience thank nina staff

Reviews.Title: “Scenic Hills Inn is located in a great place”
Reviews.Author: dot97
Reviews.Content: cant beat price friendliness clean staff helpful little people okay liked location close easy traffic continental breakfast hesitate stay

Reviews.Title: “Expanded Breakfast was dissapointing”

Reviews.Content: stayed scenic hills branson 1 week breakfast overcrowded unorganized person toasting call waffles held chewed maid putting ice quart baggie found disapointing inn
